entry.title: With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
entry.summary:
With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
Crypto, Distilled:â€‚$ETH killers were the sweetest fruit of 2021. 2024â€™s golden goose could be very different. Emerging Primitives: - Autonomous Economic Agents (AEAs) - AiDeFi (+ other DeAi verticals) - DePIN (storage, GPU, etc.) - Privacy-Enabled Infrastructure - Modular Blockchains + DA -â€¦
